_header: Lord my God all merciable / I thee beseech with heart stable
Note:
For the ME prose translations, cf. Doyle (1948)
XDoyle, A. I. “A Prayer Attributed to St Thomas Aquinas.” Dominican Studies 1 (1948): 229-38.
Subjects: prayers, to God; God, prayers to
_description: A prayer to God the Father attributed to St. Thomas Aquinas — forty-five couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
LOrd my God al MerciableI þe bi seche wiþ herte
                    stable…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þyne Ioyes vsen and wiþ þe woneIn þi
                    glorie wiþ ffadur and sone. Amen.
